il  
Cc: ' (USANYS) [Contractor]"
Subject: Fwd: Request for Comment 
Date: Thu, 21 Oct 2021 15:54:12 +0000 
> 
Monique: forwarded your query regarding a motion filed by Ghislaine Maxwell's counsel. As you might 
anticipate, we will decline to comment on any pending litigation, and in any event, as a matter of office policy, prosecutors 
in our office do not respond to media inquiries, on the record, on background, or off the record. Please direct any further 
inquiries to me or my colleague, Cc'd here. 
Best, 
M 
Spokesman 
United States 
Department of Justice 
U.S. 
Attorney's Office I Southern District of New York 
I Mobile: I 
Press Office: 
EFTA00027707
